briefTitle: A Study Of Milnacipran In Patients With Fibromyalgia: Effects On 24 Hour Ambulatory Blood Pressure Monitoring
officialTitle: A Randomized, Double-Blind, Placebo-Controlled, Dose Escalation Study of Milnacipran 100 And 200 MG Daily in Patients With Fibromyalgia: Effects On 24 Hour Ambulatory Blood Pressure
summary: The study is designed to accurately assess any changes in blood pressure and pulse at 100 and 200 mg daily dose of milnacipran in patients with fibromyalgia syndrome.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Mean Systolic Blood Pressure Following 12-hour Period Post-AM Dose at Visit 4
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: 4 weeks (1 week of dose-escalation, 3 weeks of 100 mg/d)
